segments.source_content:
---
slug: /200
title: "This Week In React #200: Remix, React Universe, Next.js dynamicIO, :has, Redwood, MDX, Atomic-CRM, NewArch, Fusebox, Hermes, Gesture Handler, TypedGPU, Firebase, Vite, Express, TypeScript, Rsbuild..."
authors: [matthieugicquel, cyrilbo]
date: 09-11-2024
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: Hi everyone!

translations.zh-hant: 大家好！

segments.source_content: **Cyril and Matthieu** from [Theodo Apps (formerly BAM)](https://apps.theodo.com/en?utm_source=thisweekinreact) here 👋, standing in for Seb to bring you the latest news from the React and React Native worlds.

translations.zh-hant: 這裡是來自 [Theodo Apps（前身為 BAM）](https://apps.theodo.com/en?utm_source=thisweekinreact) 的 **Cyril 和 Matthieu** 👋，代替 Seb 為您帶來 React 和 React Native 領域的最新消息。

segments.source_content: This week is all about Server Components, with new features related to them in Vite and Next.js. We also have a few articles on the topic that you might want to read. We also have a lot of Remix-related content and discussions related to the ChatGPT adoption.

translations.zh-hant: 本週聚焦於 Server Components，Vite 和 Next.js 都推出了相關新功能。我們也精選了幾篇相關文章值得一讀，同時還有大量 Remix 相關內容及 ChatGPT 整合的討論。

segments.source_content: On the React Native side, as planned, there were major announcements at React Universe, and React Native 0.76 is coming in a few weeks!

translations.zh-hant: 在 React Native 方面，按計劃在 React Universe 大會上發布了重大消息，React Native 0.76 將於幾週內推出！

segments.source_content: The React Native party is not over. Check our partner conf [**React Native 🇬🇧 London**](https://www.reactnativelondon.co.uk/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) (14 & 15 November) and get a 10% discount with our code “TWIR”. It's the first edition, and they already have a great line-up including Charlie Cheever, Alex Hunt, Charlotte Isambert, and Cedric Van Putten.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 的熱潮尚未結束。歡迎參加我們的合作會議 [**React Native 🇬🇧 London**](https://www.reactnativelondon.co.uk/?utm_source=thisweekinreact)（11月14-15日），使用代碼「TWIR」可享 9 折優惠。這是首屆活動，陣容強大，包括 Charlie Cheever、Alex Hunt、Charlotte Isambert 和 Cedric Van Putten。

segments.source_content: **Seb**: I'll drop by quickly to celebrate the 200th edition of this newsletter 🎉. Thank you for reading us so faithfully all these years. At 43k subscribers, we're sustainable and on track to becoming a real media for developers.

translations.zh-hant: **Seb**：我將短暫露面，慶祝本通訊第 200 期 🎉。感謝各位多年來的忠實閱讀。目前擁有 43,000 名訂閱者，我們已具備可持續性，正朝成為開發者專業媒體的目標邁進。

segments.source_content: <!-- truncate -->

translations.zh-hant: **💡 [在 Twitter 上查看本通訊](https://slo.im/thread) - 視覺化格式 🎨**

segments.source_content: [![Handsontable: Advanced data grid for your React app](/emails/issues/200/handsontable.jpg)](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirsep11)

translations.zh-hant: [![Handsontable：適用於 React 應用程式的高級數據網格](/emails/issues/200/handsontable.jpg)](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirsep11)

segments.source_content: **[Handsontable: Advanced data grid for your React app](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirsep11)**

translations.zh-hant: **[Handsontable：適用於 React 應用程式的高級數據網格](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirsep11)**

segments.source_content: Handsontable is [a feature-rich data grid](https://handsontable.com/demo?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirsep11) designed for React developers who need a powerful, customizable, and accessible solution to manage complex data.

translations.zh-hant: Handsontable 是[功能豐富的數據網格](https://handsontable.com/demo?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirsep11)，專為需要強大、可自訂且易於存取的解決方案來管理複雜數據的 React 開發者設計。

segments.source_content:
- A unique **spreadsheet-like interface** with sorting, filtering, and CRUD operations
- Advanced operations like conditional formatting and **400 built-in formulas**, similar to Excel
- **Customizable editors and renderers**, allowing dropdowns, menus or custom components within grid cells to fit specific use cases
- **Optimized performance** for smooth and responsive interactions
- **Accessibility with WCAG 2.1 compliance** for better support for users with disabilities

translations.zh-hant:
- 獨特的**試算表式介面**，支援排序、篩選和 CRUD 操作
- 進階操作如條件格式化和 **400 多種內建公式**，類似 Excel
- **可自訂編輯器和渲染器**，允許在網格單元格中使用下拉選單、選單或自訂組件以適應特定場景
- **優化性能**，確保流暢響應的互動體驗
- **符合 WCAG 2.1 無障礙標準**，為殘障用戶提供更好支援

segments.source_content: Handsontable adapts to various use cases, from enterprise applications to simple websites, offering performance and flexibility trusted by companies worldwide.

translations.zh-hant: Handsontable 適用於各種情境，從企業級應用到簡單網站，提供全球企業信賴的性能與靈活性。

segments.source_content: [Get started today!](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirsep11)

translations.zh-hant: [立即開始使用！](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirsep11)

segments.source_content: ## ⚛️ React {#react}

translations.zh-hant: ## ⚛️ React {#react}

segments.source_content: [![Josh Comeau - The Undeniable Utility Of CSS `:has`](/emails/issues/200/css-has.jpg)](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/css/has/)

translations.zh-hant: [![Josh Comeau - CSS `:has` 的無可否認實用性](/emails/issues/200/css-has.jpg)](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/css/has/)

segments.source_content: **CSS `:has` for React developers**

translations.zh-hant: **給 React 開發者的 CSS `:has`**

segments.source_content: This week we have 2 great articles about the new CSS `:has` selector, and how React developers can leverage it and simplify/delete their JS code while also improving performances. This new CSS feature had quite good support (92%) but can’t be polyfilled so for now you’d rather use it for subtle things and progressive enhancement.

translations.zh-hant: 本週有兩篇關於 CSS `:has` 選擇器的精彩文章，探討 React 開發者如何運用它來簡化/刪除 JS 代碼並提升效能。這項 CSS 新功能支援度良好（92%），但無法填充（polyfill），因此建議目前先用於細節優化與漸進增強。

segments.source_content: Read in that order:

translations.zh-hant: 按此順序閱讀：

segments.source_content:
- 📜 [Josh Comeau \- The Undeniable Utility Of CSS `:has`](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/css/has/): Great interactive introduction article, also including some comments and examples relevant for React developers, such as blocking the global page scroll on modal opening with a data attribute instead of an `useEffect`.
- 📜 [Nadia Makarevich \- Replacing React code with CSS `:has` selector](https://www.developerway.com/posts/replacing-react-with-css): Gives a few more interesting React-based examples, such as handling focus, highlighting table rows or form fieldset depending on input state.

translations.zh-hant:
- 📜 [Josh Comeau \- CSS `:has` 的無可否認實用性](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/css/has/)：精彩的互動式入門文章，包含對 React 開發者相關的評論與範例，例如使用 data 屬性而非 `useEffect` 來阻止模態框開啟時的全局頁面滾動。
- 📜 [Nadia Makarevich \- 用 CSS `:has` 選擇器取代 React 程式碼](https://www.developerway.com/posts/replacing-react-with-css)：提供更多基於 React 的實用範例，例如處理焦點狀態、根據輸入狀態高亮表格行或表單欄位群組。

segments.source_content: With great power comes great responsibility. Remember to keep your React components encapsulated, and avoid styles that leak outside component boundaries whenever possible.

translations.zh-hant: 能力越大，責任越大。請保持 React 元件的封裝性，並盡可能避免樣式洩漏至元件邊界外。

segments.source_content:
- 💸 [React Component Analytics — Omlet Scans Your Codebase to Measure Component Usage to Increase Code Quality and Design Systems Adoption](https://omlet.dev/?utm_campaign=partner_this-week-in-react_newsletter-quick-link-aug-2024)
- 🐦 [Next.js - new `experimental.dynamicIO` flag to end caching headaches](https://x.com/feedthejim/status/1831224197827166613): This flag will ensure components that perform async IOs like fetches and DB queries use dynamic rendering by default.
- 🐦 [ChatGPT migrated from Next.js to Remix](https://x.com/ryanflorence/status/1831379475654947233)
- 👀 [Vite 6 PR merged - Environment API](https://github.com/vitejs/vite/pull/16471): This is especially useful for React, as it properly models the different “environments” React apps run on: browser, SSR, RSC, with separate module graphs.
- 👀 [Next.js PR - Partial Fallback Prerendering](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/68958)
- 📖 [TanStack Router - Virtual File Routes:](https://tanstack.com/router/v1/docs/framework/react/guide/virtual-file-routes) Tanstack Start has its equivalent of Remix `routes.ts`.
- 📖 [Next.js new docs - Progressive Web Applications (PWA)](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/configuring/progressive-web-apps)
- 🗓️ [React-Brussels](https://www.react.brussels/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇧🇪 Brussels - 18 October - Get a 10% discount with code “TWIR”. Come and learn from Nicolas Dubien and Charlotte Isambert !
- 🗓️ [reactjsday](https://2024.reactjsday.it/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇮🇹 Verona - 25 October - Get a 10% discount with code "TWIR". An awesome line up announced with Matheus Albuquerque, Aurora Scharff and Dani Coll !
- 🗓️ [Squiggle Conf](https://2024.squiggleconf.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇺🇸 Boston - 03 & 04 October - Last call for tickets ! Don’t miss this event, and the “TWIR” 10% discount code !
- 📜 [React and FormData](https://reacttraining.com/blog/react-and-form-data): advocates using FormData and provides practical solutions and TypeScript compatibility via Zod.
- 📜 [Modern Data-Fetching in React](https://reacttraining.com/blog/modern-data-fetching-in-react): The article compares data-fetching methods like `useEffect`, `useQuery`, React Router loaders, Next.js `getServerSideProps`, Remix loaders, and React Server Components, highlighting trade-offs between client-side and server-side approaches.
- 📜 [Oops, I accidentally made our website faster by switching to Remix](https://echobind.com/post/oops-i-accidentally-made-our-website-faster-by-switching-to-remix): Echobind details migration story from Next.js/Vercel to Remix/Railway. They were only looking to save a few bucks and were surprised by the performance (Lighthouse score) and SEO improvements.
- 📜 [Deploying a Next.js App to Production in any server](https://www.saybackend.com/blog/04-deploy-nextjs-to-production-without-vercel): It does not give you all the optimizations Vercel provides, but it’s possible to deploy Next.js apps with docker and the `standalone` Next.js output mode.
- 📜 [How to Show Task Sequence Progress with React Suspense and RSC in Next.js](https://www.nico.fyi/blog/next-js-sequential-tasks-progress-stepper-with-rsc-and-suspense): Using the `use` hook.
- 📜 [Expressive components in vanilla React, part 1: TypeStates](https://massimilianomirra.com/notes/expressive-components-in-vanilla-react-part-1-type-states): “The choice isn’t really between building a state machine or not, it’s rather between building it implicitly or explicitly”.
- 📜 [Preact or Svelte? An Embedded Widget Use Case](https://sentry.engineering/blog/preact-or-svelte-an-embedded-widget-use-case): Sentry chose Preact over Svelte for their user feedback widget.
- 📜 [Vercel - What’s new in React 19](https://vercel.com/blog/whats-new-in-react-19)
- 📜 [How to Use React Compiler](https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/react-compiler-complete-guide-react-19/?utm_source=newsletter.reactdigest.net&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=how-to-use-react-compiler)
- 📜 [MDX in Next.js](https://spacejelly.dev/posts/mdx-in-nextjs)
- 📜 [Component auto import in Astro and MDX](https://lirantal.com/blog/component-auto-import-in-astro-framework/)
- 📜 [File uploads with Remix](https://programmingarehard.com/2024/09/06/remix-file-uploads-updated.html/)
- 📦 [Redwood v8.0](https://redwoodjs.com/upgrade/v8): Background jobs, easier SSR/RSC setup, Vite for Storybook, Docker support, and key package updates, while deprecating Webpack
- 📦 [Remix 2.12 - Single Fetch improvements \+ `future.unstable_optimizeDeps`](https://remix.run/docs/en/main/start/changelog#v2120)
- 📦 [React Router 6.26.2 - Update the `unstable_dataStrategy` API](https://reactrouter.com/en/main/start/changelog#v6262)
- 📦 [Remix-the-web - Collection of packages for use with Remix or any web framework](https://github.com/mjackson/remix-the-web)
- 📦 [Atomic-CRM - Full-featured free CRM built with React, react-admin, and Supabase](https://marmelab.com/atomic-crm/)
- 🎥 [Wes Bos - Why did OpenAI move from Next.js to Remix?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hHWgGfZpk00)
- 🎥 [Fireship - Front-end web development is changing, quickly (shadcn/ui, V0)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TBIjgBVFjVI)
- 🎥 [Theo - React's most dangerous feature (“use server”)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yUm-ET8w_28&t=1068s)
- 🎥 [Jack Herrington - ShadCN’s Revolutionary New CLI](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LEFRcCf4ehc)
- 🎙️ [This Month in React August 2024 - Matt Pocock taught us to make modules, RN is faster, iterator helpers are cool, JSR/Deno going sour](https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/reactiflux/episodes/TMiR-2024-08-Matt-Pocock-taught-us-to-make-modules--RN-is-faster--iterator-helpers-are-cool--JSRDeno-going-sour-e2o0cor)

segments.source_content: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

translations.zh-hant: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

segments.source_content: Last week, Wrocław was the stage for React Universe, where major announcements thrilled the React Native community. One of the standout moments was the unveiling of React Native 0.76, set to launch by the end of October. This release brings significant advancements, including the New Architecture enabled by default and the introduction of completely revamped React Native DevTools. It’s already available as [a 0.76 release candidate](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.76.0-rc.0)\!

translations.zh-hant: 上週，弗羅茨瓦夫成為 React Universe 的舞台，重大公告令 React Native 社群振奮。其中最引人注目的是 React Native 0.76 的發布預告，預計十月底推出。此版本帶來重大進展，包括預設啟用新架構及全面翻新的 React Native 開發者工具。目前已可作為 [0.76 候選版本](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.76.0-rc.0)\ 使用！

segments.source_content: [![React Native DevTools](/emails/issues/200/react-native-devtools.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b48Lax2-jOQ&t=4350s)

translations.zh-hant: [![React Native 開發者工具](/emails/issues/200/react-native-devtools.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b48Lax2-jOQ&t=4350s)

segments.source_content:
- 🎥 [Alex Hunt - The New React Native Debugger - Codename "Fusebox"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b48Lax2-jOQ&t=4350s)
  Debugging tools for React Native have long been fragmented, but the new "React Native DevTools" introduces a unified experience with a new backend powered by the Chrome DevTools Protocol (CDP). This architecture, supported by IDEs and Chrome DevTools, promises more reliable breakpoints and stable reloads. It supports both the new and old architectures, positioning itself as the go-to debugging solution for React Native apps. Direct Hermes debugging via Chrome will be phased out, though performance and network inspection features are still in progress.

translations.zh-hant:
- 🎥 [Alex Hunt - 全新 React Native 調試工具 - 代號 "Fusebox"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b48Lax2-jOQ&t=4350s)
  React Native 的調試工具長期處於分散狀態，但新的 "React Native DevTools" 透過基於 Chrome 開發者工具協議 (CDP) 的新後端實現統一體驗。此架構獲 IDE 和 Chrome DevTools 支援，承諾提供更可靠的斷點和穩定的重新載入功能。它同時支援新舊架構，成為 React Native 應用的首選調試方案。直接透過 Chrome 調試 Hermes 的方式將逐步淘汰，儘管性能和網絡檢查功能仍在開發中。

segments.source_content: [![Hermes Performance Chart](/emails/issues/200/hermes-perf.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pfeTPSai6vc&t=8702s)

translations.zh-hant: [![Hermes 性能圖表](/emails/issues/200/hermes-perf.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pfeTPSai6vc&t=8702s)

segments.source_content:
- 🎥 [Tzvetan Mikov - Hermes: Better performance with runtime bytecode translation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pfeTPSai6vc&t=8702s)  
  Static Hermes, introduced at React Native Europe last year, has sparked significant interest by challenging existing JavaScript engine standards. While still under development, Static Hermes offers a novel approach by compiling JavaScript into native machine code or typed bytecode through type annotation analysis, with the potential for C++-level performance. However, this workflow has its limitations: over-the-air (OTA) updates will no longer function, current JavaScript build tools like Babel do not retain type annotations, and there is still a considerable amount of untyped code in use. To address these challenges, the Hermes team has introduced runtime bytecode translation, which promises performance boosts of up to 12 times faster for native compilation. These innovations will be available in Hermes v2, once they have undergone extensive internal testing at Meta.

translations.zh-hant:
- 🎥 [Tzvetan Mikov - Hermes: Better performance with runtime bytecode translation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pfeTPSai6vc&t=8702s)  
  去年在 React Native Europe 推出的 Static Hermes，透過挑戰現有 JavaScript 引擎標準引發了廣泛關注。雖然仍在開發階段，但 Static Hermes 提供了一種創新方法：透過類型註解分析將 JavaScript 編譯為原生機器碼或類型化字節碼，具備達到 C++ 級效能的潛力。然而，此工作流程存在限制：空中更新（OTA）將不再運作、現有 JavaScript 建構工具（如 Babel）無法保留類型註解，且仍有大量未類型化程式碼在使用中。為解決這些挑戰，Hermes 團隊推出了運行時字節碼轉譯技術，可將原生編譯效能提升高達 12 倍。這些創新將在 Hermes v2 中推出，待 Meta 完成全面內部測試後即可使用。

segments.source_content:
- 💸 [React Native Mastery - The only course you need to Master React Native & Expo](https://notjust.dev/react-native-mastery?utm_source=twir&utm_medium=email)
- 🐦 [React Native Firebase supports the New Architecture](https://x.com/notbrent/status/1832108444578672709): Great news as it’s widely used across projects. It was one of the missing stones to be able to activate the new architecture.
- 🐦 [React Native IDE will support the New React Debugger (Fusebox)](https://x.com/kzzzf/status/1832017321235190117)
- 📖 [New updates from Expo documentation](https://x.com/amanhimself/status/1833466032209727662): non-route files in expo-router, upgrade helper update for SDK 51, push notifications guide, E2E tests with Maestro.
- 📜 [The beauty of mathematics in crafting stunning animations](https://expo.dev/blog/the-beauty-of-mathematics-in-crafting-stunning-animations)
- 📜 [Universal React Native - Operational Efficiency Across Platforms](https://raf.dev/blog/universal-react-native/)
- 📜 [From idea to Google Play Store in 100 days](https://expo.dev/blog/from-idea-to-google-play-store-in-100-days)
- 📦 [Metro v0.80.11 - Perf improvements making builds up to 15 times faster](https://x.com/MetroBundler/status/1831709057670861260)
- 📦 [React Native Gesture Handler 2.19 - Full macOS support, keyboard accessibility on Web, multiple pointers support in LongPress](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-gesture-handler/releases/tag/2.19.0)
- 📦 [TypeGPU - TypeScript library that enhances the WebGPU API, allowing resource management in a type-safe, declarative way](https://docs.swmansion.com/TypeGPU/)
- 📦 [expo-reaction-menu](https://github.com/arunabhverma/expo-reaction-menu): A showcase of a smooth reaction menu that can be used in messaging apps using Expo and Reanimated.
- 📦 [InAppModule - Example repo to add a Turbo Native Module locally in your app, and not as an external library](https://github.com/cipolleschi/inappmodule)
- 🎥 [Reactiive - Pager Dots Animation with React Native (Reanimated)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=04K3wPK2yC8)
- 🎥 [Expo - How to create a native module with the Expo modules API](https://youtu.be/CdaQSlyGik8?si=aH_DWm6nr5BM3hYL)
- 🎙️ [React Universe On Air 42 - Crossing Paths of React And React Native Ecosystems](https://www.callstack.com/podcasts/crossing-paths-of-react-and-react-native-ecosystems)
- 🎙️ [React-Native-Radio 306 - React Native \+ Sentry: A Match Made in Heaven](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/306-react-native-sentry-a-match-made-in-heaven-with-krystof-woldrich)
- 🎙️ [Rocket Ship 49 - Migrating to Expo from RNC CLI & Testing Libraries with Steve Galili](https://share.transistor.fm/s/e96a142b)

segments.source_content: ## 🔀 Other {#other}

translations.zh-hant: ## 🔀 其他 {#other}

segments.source_content:
- 🐦 [Tailwind v4 alpha demo](https://x.com/adamwathan/status/1830715726195306731)
- 📖 [Vitest cheat sheet](https://github.com/sapegin/vitest-cheat-sheet)
- 📜 [ESLint v8.x end of life and version support policy](https://eslint.org/blog/2024/09/eslint-v8-eol-version-support/): support stop in October, it’s time to migrate to ESLint v9 and flat config
- 📜 [CSS display contents](https://ishadeed.com/article/display-contents/)
- 📜 [The State of ES5 on the Web](https://philipwalton.com/articles/the-state-of-es5-on-the-web/)
- 📜 [CSS @property and the New Style](https://ryanmulligan.dev/blog/css-property-new-style/)
- 📦 [Typescript v5.6 - Disallowed Nullish and Truthy Checks, , Iterator Helper Methods, `--noUncheckedSideEffectImports`, `--noCheck`, Exclude Patterns for Auto-Imports & more](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/announcing-typescript-5-6/)
- 📦 [Rsbuild 1.0 - Build tool based on Rspack](https://rsbuild.dev/community/releases/v1-0)
- 📦 [Express 5.0](https://github.com/expressjs/express/releases/tag/v5.0.0): But still using `next` npm dist tag [until the types are updated and migration docs are written](https://github.com/expressjs/express/issues/5944#issuecomment-2341980442).
- 🎥 [Matt Pocock - 5 Things They’ll never Add To TypeScript](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zsj1UlCsuio): Stricter Omit, Negated Types, Nominal/Branded Types, Throws and Exact Types.

translations.zh-hant:
- 🐦 [Tailwind v4 alpha 示範](https://x.com/adamwathan/status/1830715726195306731)
- 📖 [Vitest 速查表](https://github.com/sapegin/vitest-cheat-sheet)
- 📜 [ESLint v8.x 生命週期結束與版本支援政策](https://eslint.org/blog/2024/09/eslint-v8-eol-version-support/)：支援將於十月終止，應遷移至 ESLint v9 和 flat config
- 📜 [CSS display contents](https://ishadeed.com/article/display-contents/)
- 📜 [ES5 在 Web 上的現狀](https://philipwalton.com/articles/the-state-of-es5-on-the-web/)
- 📜 [CSS @property 與新樣式](https://ryanmulligan.dev/blog/css-property-new-style/)
- 📦 [Typescript v5.6 - 禁用空值與真值檢查、迭代器輔助方法、`--noUncheckedSideEffectImports`、`--noCheck`、自動導入排除模式等](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/announcing-typescript-5-6/)
- 📦 [Rsbuild 1.0 - 基於 Rspack 的建置工具](https://rsbuild.dev/community/releases/v1-0)
- 📦 [Express 5.0](https://github.com/expressjs/express/releases/tag/v5.0.0)：仍使用 `next` npm 分發標籤，[待類型更新與遷移文件完成](https://github.com/expressjs/express/issues/5944#issuecomment-2341980442)
- 🎥 [Matt Pocock - TypeScript 永不加入的 5 項功能](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zsj1UlCsuio)：更嚴格的 Omit、否定類型、名義/品牌類型、Throws 和精確類型
